headerTextP: Enhance your English skills through real-time conversations with AI. Personalized feedback, interactive exercises, and voice recognition for a more immersive experience.
firstLetterText: Enhance your English skills with AI-powered personalized exercises.
secondLetterText: Get instant feedback on grammar, pronunciation, and vocabulary.
thirdLetterText: Short quizzes tailored to your level and availability to track your progress.
title2Question: Ready to improve your English with AI?
textQuestion: Join our platform and refine your English in a smart and flexible way.
footerText: Innovating English learning with artificial intelligence.
